import React from 'react' import Proptypes from 'prop-types' import Task from './Task' const AddTask = () => { const [text, setText] = useState('') const [day, setDay] = useState('') const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(false) return (
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default AddTask
